<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1215</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Social Action and Responsibility 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialtätigkeit und Verantwortlichkeit 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Action et responsabilité sociales 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ação e responsabilidade sociais 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Azione e responsabilità sociali 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές ενέργεια και ευθύνη 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Acción y responsabilidad sociales 2</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson focuses on the Jewish obligation to reach out to help those who are less fortunate.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chesed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">am israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion konzentriert auf die jüdische 
Verpflichtung, heraus zu erreichen, um denen zu helfen, die weniger 
glücklich sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon se concentre sur l'obligation juive 
d'atteindre dehors pour aider ceux qui sont moins chanceux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição focaliza na obrigação jewish 
alcançar para fora para ajudar àqueles que são mais menos 
afortunados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione mette a fuoco sull'obbligo ebreo di
raggiungere fuori per aiutare coloro che è meno fortunato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα εστιάζει στην εβραϊκή υποχρέωση να 
φτάσει για να βοηθήσει εκείνους που είναι λιγότερο τυχεροί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección se centra en la obligación judía 
de alcanzar hacia fuera para ayudar a los que sean menos afortunados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chesed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Judentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">morgens Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chesed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">AM Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">chesed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">am Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">chesed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Israele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el"></string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
